sentence: The cow grazed peacefully in the field.

definition: a large domesticated animal used for riding and work
sentence: She rode her horse along the dusty trail.

definition: a large farm for raising cattle or horses
sentence: They own a sprawling ranch in Texas.

definition: a supportive structure for a rider on a horse
sentence: He adjusted the saddle before mounting the horse.

definition: a rope with a noose used for catching livestock
sentence: The cowboy skillfully threw his lasso to catch the steer.

definition: a large, shaggy animal native to North America
sentence: The buffalo roamed freely across the plains.

definition: domesticated animals raised for meat or milk
sentence: The rancher counted the cattle in the herd.

definition: a person who takes care of horses or cattle
sentence: The wrangler expertly guided the horses into the pen.

definition: a free-roaming horse of the Western United States
sentence: The mustang galloped across the open range.

definition: a cowboy or a cattle driver
sentence: The cowpoke rode out at dawn to gather the cattle.
